about_the_game:
There are many myths and legends about a secret trove of artifacts in the library of the Vatican - the city-state in the very center of Rome. One of these legends is the story of the Chronovisor - a mysterious device that “carries you back in time”…
Embark on a journey through Rome to uncover the secrets of the Chronovisor and rescue trapped heroes. Along the way, you’ll make astonishing discoveries: alien artifacts, enigmatic Masonic symbols, and hidden Roman dodecahedrons. Explore the winding alleys of Trastevere, browse antiques at the Flea Market, visit the Catacombs and the Castle of the Holy Angel, and experience the Roman Forum and Piazza Navona. And finally, the Vatican Museums will reveal one of their secrets to you...

Key Game Features:

- Experience captivating 360-degree panoramas and stunning 3D views!
- Engage with a serial plot structure filled with unpredictable events.
- Immerse yourself in the game’s enchanting atmosphere through captivating music.
- Discover genuine vintage hidden objects throughout the game.
- Encounter vivid and memorable characters.
